arts.ttl: Coppa Italia | Atalanta 6-1 Cesena: Match Report
arts.sum: Atalanta delivered a dominant performance in the Coppa Italia Round of 16, securing a comprehensive 6-1 victory over Cesena at the Gewiss Stadium. The Serie A leaders showcased their attacking prowess with goals from multiple players, effectively cruising into the quarter-finals. The game began with Davide Zappacosta opening the scoring in the 4th minute with a precise right-footed shot into the bottom corner. Charles De Ketelaere quickly doubled Atalanta’s lead just minutes later, finding the bottom corner after a neat exchange with Mateo Retegui. Lazar Samardzic extended the lead to 3-0 in the 27th minute, scoring during a swift counterattack. The post Coppa Italia | Atalanta 6-1 Cesena: Match Report appeared first on FootItalia.com.
